text: Huon de Méry was the creator of Li Tournoiemenz Anticrit.William W. Kibler, Medieval France: An Encyclopedia (Garland, 1995), p. 467. He was born in 1200 and died in 1250.Merey History, Family Crest & Coats of Arms == References == Category:1200 births Category:1250 deaths
title: Huon de Méry
